tasks.task: Observe and praise the gathered crops.
subtasks: Look at the crops.
Express admiration verbally.
Nod in agreement about their beauty.
Confirm the direction the crops are facing.

tasks.task: Tend to the crops in the morning.
subtasks: Wake up early.
Lubricate the tractor.
Check the fuel levels.
Prepare the plow attachment.
Drive the tractor to the field.
Start the tractor.
Attach the plow.
Drive the tractor through the crops.
Operate the plow to turn the soil.
Monitor the progress.
Possibly stop to check the soil texture.
Adjust the plow as needed.
Continue tilling the entire field.
Check the time and pause for the morning break.
Take a break to rest.
Resume tilling after break.
Finish preparing the field for planting.

tasks.task: Prepare breakfast.
subtasks: Find a flat surface to prepare breakfast.
Select cookware suitable for outdoor use.
Gather necessary ingredients.
Prepare breakfast ingredients (e.g., scramble eggs, toast bread).
Cook the breakfast on a portable grill or stove.
Serve the food on plates or portable dishes.
Eat the breakfast while enjoying the morning landscape.

tasks.task: Drive the tractor to the field.
subtasks: Start the tractor and drive it through the field.
Navigate the tractor into position for tilling.

tasks.task: Walk through the field after tilling.
subtasks: Inspect the turned soil.
Look for clumps or weeds.
Note any areas requiring additional tilling.

tasks.task: Adjust the plow attachment.
subtasks: Disengage the plow from the tractor.
Remove the current plow blade.
Replace the blade with a different one if needed.
Reattach the plow to the tractor.
Set the depth and angle of the plow.

tasks.task: Take a midday break.
subtasks: Collect chairs or a blanket if sitting outdoors is desired.
Find a cool, shady spot to rest.
Eat a packed lunch.
Chat with fellow workers (if present).
享North the progress of the work.

tasks.task: Continue tilling after lunch.
subtasks: Reattach the plow if it was changed.
Resume driving the tractor in rows.
Operate the plow to further refine the soil texture.
Take frequent breaks as necessary.
Stay hydrated by drinking water regularly.

tasks.task: Drive the tractor back to the storage area.
subtasks: Park the tractor in the designated spot.
Turn off the engine and check for any issues.

tasks.task: Walk back to the house or base camp.
subtasks: Jog or walk through the fields.
Enjoy the fresh air and natural environment.

tasks.task: Prepare and frame photos of the crops.
subtasks: Use a数码camera or smartphone to take pictures.
Select the best angles and lighting.
Edit the images if needed (crop, contrast, etc.)
Upload the photos to a storage device or post them online.

tasks.task: Plan the layout for planting.
subtasks: Examine the tilled field.
Consider crop rotation or variety.
Sketch a plan for what to plant where.
Consider planting density and spacing.

tasks.task: End the day by reflecting on the progress.
subtasks: Summarize the work completed for the day.
Reflect on the quality of the soil preparation.
Look forward to the upcoming planting season.
